professional_summary: Experienced Lead Analyst and Product Owner with expertise in automation testing, product backlog management, and cross-functional collaboration.

key_responsibilities: Automated Testing: Lead team in converting over 500+ manual test cases to automated cases using Selenium framework.
Process Flow Design: Developed and designed a standard process flow for automation testing deployment across multiple teams.
Debugging & Troubleshooting: Addressed issues within the organization through systematic debugging.
Onboarding Process: Developed an onboarding process for new hires and contractors using Confluence
reducing downtime from two months to two days.
Excel Upload Tool: Created a tool using Spring Framework and PL/SQL to reduce dependency on manual inputs.
GUI Implementation: Conceptualized and executed GUI implementation for international clients.

tools_and_software: MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook)
